body.name: Arm & Hammer Power Sheets Laundry Detergent, Fresh Linen 50ct, up to 100 Small Loads (Packaging may vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 4 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: One 50 count box of ARM & HAMMER Power Sheets Laundry Detergent in Fresh Linen scent cleans 50 medium loads (up to 100 small loads) when used as directed; this concentrated laundry detergent delivers a powerful, deep clean on dark clothing or white clothing with no bleach

Convenient laundry detergent sheets mean no drips, no spills, and no plastic bottle waste; they use small, light, recyclable packs to avoid lugging heavy bottles up and down stairs to basement laundry​

Ultra concentrated to tackle tough stains with a fresh linen scent; these dissolvable detergent laundry sheets are made with the same type of powerful ingredients as our liquid laundry detergent for a trusted ARM & HAMMER Laundry clean​

These concentrated HE laundry detergent sheets use Quick Dissolve Technology to dissolve quickly and fully in all wash temps, even cold water, to deliver a deep clean in high efficiency washing machines​
No spills or messes in each pre-measured dose; our liquidless laundry detergent sheets are an ideal travel laundry detergent for trips to laundromats ​
body.description: For a powerful, deep clean without plastic bottle waste or mess, use ARM & HAMMER Power Sheets Laundry Detergent, Fresh Linen, 50 count, up to 100 loads. Are you concerned about your impact on the environment? If you are, ARM & HAMMER has designed this product to eliminate plastic bottle waste. Our new liquidless laundry detergent sheets use lightweight, recyclable boxes so no more lugging and pouring heavy, drippy bottles. This innovative laundry detergent sheet is ideal for travel—light, portable, convenient for laundromat or suitcase. Our no-bleach, concentrated laundry detergent sheets are tough on odors, dirt, and stains and feature a fresh linen scent. These HE detergent sheets handle tough loads of dark or white clothing in all wash temperatures, even cold water. Thanks to Quick Dissolve Technology, our high efficiency laundry detergent sheets dissolve completely in water. Use 1 sheet for medium loads or 2 sheets for large loads. Made with the same type of powerful cleaning ingredients as our liquid detergent for the trusted clean you expect from ARM & HAMMER Laundry.​

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, good for small spaces, and haven't cause eczema flare-ups like other detergents do.
reviews.reviewText: Family of six, four kids, two adults, so we go through a lot of detergent. However, we don't have the space to store large bottles of detergent and our washer and dryer lids slope, so nothing can be stored on top. Then I saw these and decided to give them a go. We love them. My kids help with the laundry and it has made it so easy for them to start a load. The box takes up hardly any room and yet it typically lasts us a month. The packaging is easy to recycle. The scent is very light and they do not seem to cause my son's eczema to flare up. Our clothes are clean. I love these. I don't see us ever going back to liquid detergent again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets are convenient, easy to use, cost effective with no heavy plastic laundry detergent to lug home from the store or to use. There is absolutely no mess, and the sheets are perforated in half to customize your laundry load. The scent is fresh, not overpowering, and the clothes are absolutely clean after washing. I feel I am avoiding plastic waste and using an effective detergent without the heavy lifting and dripping of a plastic jug. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works and no bulky container to lift. Clothes came out clean with a nice smell. Wish the clean scent was not so strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to go bottleless after learning how much plastic laundry bottles pollute landfills and don't really get recycled. I bought these on sale to try it out and they even got makeup stains out of a white towel. Linen scent is also mild and appealing. I've been converted to bottleless detergent now and won't go back. Ditch the plastic bottles, free up your laundry space and help the environment. I have HE machines and I put them straight into the drum with the clothes. No problems washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and environmentally friendly
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. I saw this on Instagram and immediately ordered them to try it. They smell good and you can pack them in a small space and easily travel with them. I only need one whole sheet (two small rectangular sheets that make one) for a big huge load. I suppose I could use 2 but I felt it wasn't needed. Works well in cold water as well. My mom, who is 80, saw these and thinks this is something she could love so she took a few to try out. I've washed towels, jeans, delicates, blankets, and a sleeping bag with these. No issues for me. I don’t get a strong smell from them personally, I feel like it’s the right amount of smell good - especially after a dry. I’m definitely sticking with these from here on! My brother took a box also as he travels on the road and he loves them as well! I should note that for my top loader washer it works better putting it on the bottom first and then load my laundry in. Even with a soap dispenser that I have it just seems to work better when placed first .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love them! No more cumbersome plastic bottles in our laundry room!
reviews.reviewText: For years I have hated the plastic jugs the liquid detergent comes in... finally found these and have not turned back. Took a bit to get the wife to switch but she now loves them too! No more mess and so easy to use. Clothes appear to always be clean, smell nice and just as good as when we used Tide! Definately recommend those to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Forget Liquids, Powders and Packs!
reviews.reviewText: These are so easy! They smell nice, it’s easy to figure out how much per load and you can tear sheets in half. No waste! No plastic jugs or cartons to throw out anymore. It cleans my husband’s grungy shop clothes as well as my delicates and our towels. I’ve stopped using dryer sheets also as they make your clothes get a gummy layer that eventually smells, and the fresh fragrance of these is just clean all the way through the dryer. I use wool dryer balls always now. They last forever. Make your laundry easier. Use laundry sheets and dryer balls. Cleaner, softer clothes with less product and packaging!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the enviroment!
reviews.reviewText: I like that this sheets are a bit easier on our planet, I do what I can-not always enough in my opinion. I have bought other laundry sheets on Amazon before that I like and still use, these are a good size and will last a while. I am a Arm & Hammer user, so now I will switch from pods to these if I can get past the very strong smell. I love linen scent, but these was so overwhelming; I put them up to freshen a closet, until I am ready to use them again. Would I recommend-Yes, would I change scents-Yes.
